org.apache.poi.util

Class ShortField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.util.ShortField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FixedField 

    public class ShortField
extends java.lang.Object
implements FixedField
    representation of a short (16-bit) field at a fixed location within a byte array(字节数组内固定位置的短（16位）字段的表示)
    Author:
    Marc Johnson (mjohnson at apache dot org

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShortField(int offset)
      construct the ShortField with its offset into its containing byte array(构造ShortField，将其偏差放入其包含字节数组)
      ShortField(int offset, byte[] data)
      Construct the ShortField with its offset into its containing byte array and initialize its value from its byte array(将ShortField及其偏差构建到其包含的字节数组中，并从其字节数组初始化其值)
      ShortField(int offset, short value)
      construct the ShortField with its offset into its containing byte array and initialize its value(将ShortField及其偏差构造到其包含字节数组中并初始化其值)
      ShortField(int offset, short value, byte[] data)
      construct the ShortField with its offset into its containing byte array, initialize its value, and write its value to its byte array(将ShortField及其包含的字节数组中的偏置构造为ShortField，初始化其值，并将其值写入其字节数组)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short get()
      get the ShortField's current value(获取ShortField的当前值)

      set the value from its offset into an array of bytes(将其偏差的值设置为字节数组)

      set the value from an InputStream(从InputStream设置值)
      void set(short value)
      set the ShortField's current value(设置ShortField的当前值)

      set the ShortField's current value and write it to a byte array(设置ShortField的当前值并将其写入字节数组)
      java.lang.String toString()
      return the value as a String(以字符串形式返回值)
      void writeToBytes(byte[] data)
      write the value out to an array of bytes at the appropriate offset(将值以适当的偏置写入字节数组)

      • ShortField

        public ShortField(int offset,
                  byte[] data)
           throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Construct the ShortField with its offset into its containing byte array and initialize its value from its byte array(将ShortField及其偏差构建到其包含的字节数组中，并从其字节数组初始化其值)
        Parameters:
        offset - of the field within its byte array(偏置-其字节数组内字段的)
        data - the byte array to read the value from(data -读取值的字节数组)
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the offset is not within the range of 0..(data.length - 1)(java.lang. ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsResponse-如果偏差不在0范围内.（数据.长度- 1）)

                  short value,
                  byte[] data)

        Throws:
